comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: **Test Coverage**: Added 'title' column to objectives view row tuple (now 7 values instead of 6). Tests in `tests/tui/test_plan_table.py` need updating: line 354 assertion and indices 356-360 in test_objectives_view_has_enriched_columns, and indices 379-382 in test_objectives_view_shows_progress_and_next.

comments.author: schrockn
comments.body:
Fixed: Updated test assertions — len check 6→7, added title assertion at index 1, shifted remaining indices +1 in both test_objectives_view_has_enriched_columns and test_objectives_view_shows_progress_and_next. All 40 tests pass.

_Addressed via `/erk:pr-address` at 2026-02-22 04:49 EST_
